name: 2021 the 5th International Conference on Intelligent Manufacturing and Automation Engineering
content: Publicationï¼š After a careful reviewing process, all the accepted papers of ICIMA 2021 will be published into Conference Proceedings. The proceedings will be published in the International Conference Proceedings Series, which will be published and submitted to Xplore. Those papers will be submitted for indexing to Ei Compendex and Scopus.
